greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers n such that A136675(n) is prime.
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Harmonic Number
mathematica: Do[ f=Numerator[ Sum[ (-1)^(k+1)*1/k^3, {k,1,n} ] ]; If[ PrimeQ[f], Print[ {n,f} ] ], {n,1,151} ]
program: (PARI) isok(n) = ispseudoprime(numerator(sum(k=1, n, (-1)^(k+1) / k^3))); \\ _Daniel Suteu_, Mar 15 2019
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Jan 16 2008
ext: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 12 2013
